Coronavirus: US Postal Service suspends items destined for China and Hong Kong amid outbreak

The United States Postal Service (USPS) will temporarily suspend items destined for China and Hong Kong.
In a note informing its counterparts all over the world, USPS said it was “experiencing significant difficulties” in dispatching letters, parcels and express mail to China, including Hong Kong and Macau, and it would no longer accept items destined for China “until sufficient transport capacity becomes available”, according to Associated Press.

https://www.scmp.com/news/china/article/3050103/coronavirus-us-postal-service-suspends-items-destined-china-and-hong

USPS已封

Coronavirus crisis disrupting flow of mail into China

replies.msg:
真係趁呢兩日ups 同 fede 仲未宣佈封 好快手寄 呢ㄧ刻有得捱貴寄 好過遲吓完全無得寄

再唔係 就淨以下兩個方法

1. 揾會飛返香港嘅朋友帶貨 (但真係唔知幾時會再擴大停飛hkg 幅度 飛唔飛到都成問題)

2. 揾美國fd 接貨 , 再轉寄過去歐洲fd 度 , 再由歐洲寄返香港 (貨係平 但郵費 double 上 當然前題係要搭通天地線)

真心 就算呢ㄧ刻郵費再貴 都未及香港嚟緊嘅炒價貴

美國amazon ebay d 貨 依家只可以做返歐美内銷 貴極都有個譜

集運命運基本上係ㄧ樣 無限期 delay

再唔係 就淨以下兩個方法

1. 揾會飛返香港嘅朋友帶貨 (但真係唔知幾時會再擴大停飛hkg 幅度 飛唔飛到都成問題)

2. 揾美國fd 接貨 , 再轉寄過去歐洲fd 度 , 再由歐洲寄返香港 (貨係平 但郵費 double 上 當然前題係要搭通天地線)

真心 就算呢ㄧ刻郵費再貴 都未及香港嚟緊嘅炒價貴

美國amazon ebay d 貨 依家只可以做返歐美内銷 貴極都有個譜

集運命運基本上係ㄧ樣 無限期 delay

quote.msg:
Coronavirus: US Postal Service suspends items destined for China and Hong Kong amid outbreak

The United States Postal Service (USPS) will temporarily suspend items destined for China and Hong Kong.
In a note informing its counterparts all over the world, USPS said it was “experiencing significant difficulties” in dispatching letters, parcels and express mail to China, including Hong Kong and Macau, and it would no longer accept items destined for China “until sufficient transport capacity becomes available”, according to Associated Press.

https://www.scmp.com/news/china/article/3050103/coronavirus-us-postal-service-suspends-items-destined-china-and-hong

美國郵政停收寄中港澳郵件
12.02.2020 09:18
美國郵政署宣布，即時停收寄往中國、香港以及澳門的郵件及包裹，因為航空公司相繼暫停到中港澳航班，派送郵件及包裹遇上極大困難，停收郵件措施會直到運輸能力回復為止。美國主要快遞公司由於有各自貨運機隊，寄往中國的快遞服務暫時未受影響。

中國郵政則表示，正逐步為郵政局、郵件處理中心和郵車消毒，確保新冠肺炎病毒不會經郵件傳播，強調病毒在物品表面生存時間不長，接收來自中國的郵件沒有風險，而寄到中國的郵件不會以面對面方式派送。


https://www.881903.com/Page/ZH-TW/newsdetail.aspx?ItemId=1263235&csid=261_341
